title: #164: Ya Fiahed!
description:
On this week's Watch What Crappens Podcast, Ben Mandelker (bsideblog) and Ronnie Karam (TrashTalkTV) join forces once again to rag on Bravo idiots. We start with Andy Cohen's teachable gay moment before moving full steam ahead into the Real Housewives of Beverly Hills Advil Drama and then Vanderpump Rules' best firing of all time. So far. Join us!
Subscribe at http://www.patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens for bonus episodes, ringtones, and live group video chat parties.
